title: Lots To Like: Nvidia, Best Buy Earnings Look Strong, While Jobless Claims Hit New Pandemic Low
text: Those were impressive earnings from Best Buy and Nvidia, with Nvidia setting a new sales record. Earnings are just about over except for a few stragglers, but they've generally painted a picture of a fast-recovering economy.

title: Nvidia stock price at risk of major pullback after earnings
text: The Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) stock price is loitering near its all-time high after the company published strong quarterly results. It is trading at $626 in premarket trading, which is 3.7% below its all-time high.
